title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally with a single CLI and Docker-style API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API, published to npm as “ollama”.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable as “ollama”.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLM, embeddings or tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with conversation history, syntax highlighting and shortcuts.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot requests to a local Ollama model for private coding assistance.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama published to Maven Central; supports streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET wrapper for Ollama with async/await, streaming chat and embeddings; NuGet package available.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example that couples Ollama with llama-index to chat over local documents.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose stacks for CPU & GPU (CUDA) deployments of Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js REST proxy that adds JWT auth, rate-limiting and usage logs in front of Ollama.

title: ollama-kt (JetBrains plugin)
summary: IntelliJ/Android Studio plugin providing inline code completion powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up ephemeral Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate offering strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API with tokio.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module that injects Ollama service with decorators for guards, interceptors and Swagger docs.

title: ollama-rag-langchain discussion
summary: Reddit thread sharing a complete RAG setup using Ollama + LangChain + Chroma for private document QA.
